New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest century in World Cup history (40 balls)
Bas de Leede delivered the most expensive over in men's ODI history
Adam Zampa took a hat-trick and recorded 4 wickets for 8 runs
Key Match Events: Australia won by 309 runs after setting a target of 400 runs
Zampa's hat-trick led to Netherlands' collapse
Glenn Maxwell and David Warner's partnership was pivotal
Pre-Game Insights: Australia elected to bat first in the match
The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
Pat Cummins highlighted the importance of the win for Australia's momentum
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell expressed confidence in his performance and the team's future
David Warner praised Maxwell's innings and the team's resilience
Scott Edwards reflected on the Dutch team's challenges and areas for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi
The Netherlands' batting powerplay was ineffective early on
The match was a significant win for Australia in the World Cup campaign
